resources.string: People use it to move around. It has 2 wheels and moves when you kick the pedals. What are we looking for?
It is used when you want to highlight something on paper or in a book. It can be done with different colors. What are we looking for?
We are searching for an animal that lives in water. What are we looking for?
We are looking for a pocket-size device. It is used for communicating with people. What are we looking for?
We are looking for a highly civilized area with a dense population. What are we looking for?
